They do not distinguish the approach to the fruit of once-returning and the fruit of once-returning based on having characteristics or being without characteristics, nor do they distinguish having characteristics or being without characteristics based on the approach to the fruit of once-returning and the fruit of once-returning.

They do not distinguish the approach to the fruit of stream-entry and the fruit of stream-entry based on having aspirations or being without aspirations, nor do they distinguish having aspirations or being without aspirations based on the approach to the fruit of stream-entry and the fruit of stream-entry;

they do not distinguish the approach to the fruit of once-returning and the fruit of once-returning, the approach to the fruit of non-returning and the fruit of non-returning, the approach to the state of arhat and the state of arhat based on having aspirations or being without aspirations, nor do they distinguish having aspirations or being without aspirations based on the approach to the fruit of once-returning and the fruit of once-returning, the approach to the fruit of non-returning and the fruit of non-returning, the approach to the state of arhat and the state of arhat.

They do not distinguish the approach to the fruit of stream-entry and the fruit of stream-entry based on arising or non-arising, nor do they distinguish arising or non-arising based on the approach to the fruit of stream-entry and the fruit of stream-entry;

They do not discriminate the approach to the fruit of once-returning and the fruit of once-returning as arising or non-arising, nor do they discriminate arising or non-arising as the approach to the fruit of once-returning and the fruit of once-returning.ğŸ”½They do not discriminate the approach to the fruit of non-returning and the fruit of non-returning as cessation or non-cessation, nor do they discriminate cessation or non-cessation as the approach to the fruit of non-returning and the fruit of non-returning.

They do not discriminate the approach to the fruit of arhatship and the fruit of arhatship as cessation or non-cessation, nor do they discriminate cessation or non-cessation as the approach to the fruit of arhatship and the fruit of arhatship.

They do not discriminate the approach to the fruit of stream-entry and the fruit of stream-entry as tranquil or not tranquil, nor do they discriminate tranquil or not tranquil as the approach to the fruit of stream-entry and the fruit of stream-entry.

They do not discriminate the approach to the fruit of arhatship and the fruit of arhatship as tranquil or not tranquil, nor do they discriminate tranquil or not tranquil as the approach to the fruit of arhatship and the fruit of arhatship.

Do not distinguish the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva's teachings by means of having vows or being without vows, and also do not distinguish having vows or being without vows by means of the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva's teachings;

Do not distinguish unsurpassed perfect enlightenment by means of having vows or being without vows, and also do not distinguish having vows or being without vows by means of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.
Do not distinguish the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva's teachings by means of arising or non-arising, and also do not distinguish arising or non-arising by means of the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva's teachings;
Do not distinguish unsurpassed perfect enlightenment by means of arising or non-arising, and also do not distinguish arising or non-arising by means of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

Such people will never discriminate the ground of extreme joy as empty or not empty, nor will they discriminate emptiness or non-emptiness as the ground of extreme joy;

Do not use emptiness and non-emptiness to discriminate the ground of purity, the ground of luminous radiance, the ground of flaming wisdom, the ground of utmost difficulty to conquer, the ground of manifestation, the ground of far-reaching, the ground of immovability, the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds, and also do not use the ground of purity, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom and the ground of Dharma clouds to discriminate emptiness and non-emptiness.

Do not use characteristics and the absence of characteristics to discriminate the ground of utmost joy, and also do not use the ground of utmost joy to discriminate characteristics and the absence of characteristics;

Do not use characteristics and the absence of characteristics to discriminate the ground of purity, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom and the ground of Dharma clouds, and also do not use the ground of purity, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom and the ground of Dharma clouds to discriminate characteristics and the absence of characteristics.

Do not use aspirations and the absence of aspirations to discriminate the ground of utmost joy, and also do not use the ground of utmost joy to discriminate aspirations and the absence of aspirations;

They do not distinguish the ground of stainlessness, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds in terms of having vows or being vowless, nor do they distinguish having vows or being vowless in terms of the ground of stainlessness, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds.
They do not distinguish the ground of joy in terms of arising or non-arising, nor do they distinguish arising or non-arising in terms of the ground of joy;

they do not distinguish the ground of stainlessness, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds in terms of arising or non-arising, nor do they distinguish arising or non-arising in terms of the ground of stainlessness, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds.
They do not distinguish the ground of joy in terms of ceasing or not ceasing, nor do they distinguish ceasing or not ceasing in terms of the ground of joy;

they do not distinguish the ground of stainlessness, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds in terms of ceasing or not ceasing, nor do they distinguish ceasing or not ceasing in terms of the ground of stainlessness, the ground of luminous radiance, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds.
One should not discriminate the ground of extreme joy as tranquil or not tranquil, nor should one discriminate tranquility or not tranquility based on the ground of extreme joy;

One should not discriminate the ground of being free from defilement, the ground of increasing light, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of cloud of Dharma as tranquil or not tranquil, nor should one discriminate tranquility or not tranquility based on the ground of being free from defilement, the ground of increasing light, up to the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of cloud of Dharma.
